website_summaries.verdict: Keep your wine cool with a beautiful natural marble chiller.
pros: A soft covering under the heavy marble chiller keeps it from scratching up your countertops
The marble material doesn't produce condensation, either
No dinner parties on the horizon?
Use the cylindrical chiller as a kitchen utensil holder

customer_reviews.title: This keeps wine cold!
customer_reviews.text: This cooler lives in our freezer. We were concerned with where to keep it. The freezer was the answer as it keeps the cooler ready to keep our wine cold. We highly recommend this cooler. Once you use it, you’ll understand why we like it.
customer_reviews.author: mark95man

customer_reviews.title: Fine but too small for champagne bottles
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item specifically for use with bottles of champagne/sparkling wine. It's slightly too narrow to hold a standard bottle of sparkling wine, which is incredibly annoying and also the product description is incorrect. Other than that, nice, but I feel frustrated that it doesn't do one of the things it claims to do, and the main thing I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Sarie

customer_reviews.title: Black =/= Gray
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a decent product but I cannot get over the fact that I received a product with a completely different color and texture than advertised. The product title explicitly states "gray" in the title, while the one I have is almost pitch black.
customer_reviews.author: Ozer Unluhisarcikli

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. My friends are very impress
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. My friends are very impress, and want one for themselves. I plane to buy more for Christmas gifts
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased 2 of these to use in the refrigerator. We store open bottles in the door but have had a couple of bad experiences when someone opened the door to vigorously and the bottle fell out. This is just the right weight to make it secure! Might sound silly but it works for us in 2 locations!
customer_reviews.author: K Vandygriff

customer_reviews.title: Keeps bottles surprisingly cool
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my parents. Stick the chiller in the freezer for 20min or longer (until nice and frosty) and it'll keep any bottle of wine or champagne very chilled over the duration of dinner, games, and relaxing with friends and family. Looks great too, and seems to fit nearly any bottle size (even larger-diameter champagne bottles).
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Cruse

customer_reviews.title: Mismatch
customer_reviews.text: I like the wine coolers, but assumed they would match. Love the marble looking one; not the other, but I had to use them right away so couldn't return the dark one.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Danielson

customer_reviews.title: Keeps stuff cold and not ugly = excellent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work - we all visit the keurig frequently but don’t have a fridge nearby to keep our creamer cold. This thing has been a lifesaver! Keeps stuff cold for a long time. I keep it in the freezer when we’re not using it.
customer_reviews.author: MrsBrown

customer_reviews.title: Measurments are  scam!
customer_reviews.text: Advertised 5x5x7. If that was so it would hold a 1.5L bottle, it doesn't, the measurements are actually 4 1/4 x 4 1/4 x 7. Not as finished as other marble wine coolers I have seen. They are out to scam you!
customer_reviews.author: Wine Lover

customer_reviews.title: Much darker than grey
customer_reviews.text: They must have changed their quarry because as others have said it’s pretty close to black still a beautiful piece on its own. Well packaged in a two piece styrofoam insert. I’m pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Philip Hodgin

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommended.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to do. We use it all the time and I don't now how we managed without it before. Only complaint (which isn't a real complaint) is I wish it would stay cold through 4 bottles :). I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to the Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I bought one as a wedding gift, and had to sneak a peek. I fell in love! Had to buy my own. Got mine two days ago... I love it more than I thought I would. Nice addition to the kitchen island.
customer_reviews.author: LoBePenni

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. Fast shipping. Pretty.
customer_reviews.text: Medium sized utensil holder. I ended up giving 8t to my friend who doesn't cook.as.much and has less utensils. I need a bigger one. The quality was good though so I dis contemplate using as a vase but my friend needed it more. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: SSTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Ok for wine but not for all champagne
customer_reviews.text: It does aid in keeping a standard size wine bottle cool. Some sparkling bottles however are slightly wider diameter and will not fit.
customer_reviews.author: J-man

customer_reviews.title: Attractive
customer_reviews.text: It is fun and works. Anxious to use it outside in the summer. We keep it in our freezer all the time. Handy to pull out when serving a wine that needs to be chilled.
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute, heavy, looks nice. Didn’t keep our wine as cold as we wanted and it drips condensation all over so you’ll need a towel under it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Boca

customer_reviews.title: Completely different color
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice wine chiller and it is lovely, but the color I received is completely different from the photo advertised. It does say "shades of gray may vary", but that was not accessible information; it took me a while to find it. The color I received was pretty much black, not gray at all. I probably wouldn't have bought it if I knew it would be this color. I wish they advertised how much it would vary more easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Williams

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color!
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I purchased this as a gift for Christmas for my daughter who specified that she wanted a light gray colored wine chiller. I expected to receive a gray marble wine chiller but received a black one instead (and I understand that marble varies in color but this one is too dark to be considered anything but black). However, the chiller is very nice with a rubber mat on the bottom and appears to be able to hold a wine or champagne bottle as stated. Depending on what my daughter thinks of the color it might have to be returned and that's a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: RJS

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: It works well and adds some class to dinner parties. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Wine Chiller! 🍷♥️
customer_reviews.text: I love pulling this little gem out of the freezer and serving wine to our guests. It’s so beautiful!! And super functional in the desert heat!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Sebens

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My honey and I love to drink wine. When we are out and order a bottle, it always comes in cooler, so we ordered one for home. It keeps our wine cold on a summer night.
customer_reviews.author: NRG

customer_reviews.title: The granite is solid and I really like the protective covering on the bottom of the cooler
customer_reviews.text: This wine cooler is very classy. The granite is solid and I really like the protective covering on the bottom of the cooler. This protects my granite counter tops by not scratching the surface. The cooler is thick and keeps the wine at the perfect temperature for several hours. I really like this cooler and it is an excellent value for the cost. Get one...you will not be disappointed. Debra, Golden Valley, MN
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BLACK not grey.
customer_reviews.text: This is a BLACK marble wine chiller. I ordered it hoping I would get the grey marble one I wanted but no, like so many other reviewers, it was black. Sending this back ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: KNucci

customer_reviews.title: Just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great. Got it for a gift for a friend and she couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Ligia Lanza

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and holds my bottle of Prosecco perfectly. We put it outside when we have guests and it keeps the bottle nicely chilled and looks pretty.
customer_reviews.author: desiree

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bit not functional
customer_reviews.text: This is far from a chiller. Yes, the stone gets cold but it doesn’t stay cold for more than a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: G. Saxon

customer_reviews.title: Not gray. It’s black.
customer_reviews.text: It works, which is great. It keeps wine cool like it should. But it’s not gray (not a light gray, not a dark gray). It’s black, which is very disappointing. I actually don’t like how it looks at all and wish I had returned it. But I needed to use it the night I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Gift for friend. She loves it. Very good quality. I'm sure she will get alot of use out of it
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: color varience
customer_reviews.text: ordered two of the grey wine coolers. One came as expected. The other one was black not grey. I know that there is a color difference on each dye lot. But to get two VERY different colors was unacceptable. The quality on both was good. spped of delivery was good
customer_reviews.author: David M McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a Christmas gift and the recipient loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Earline Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice Father's Day Gift
customer_reviews.text: A great wine chiller; keeps bottles at correct temperature over several hours...plus the granite color looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wine lovers
customer_reviews.text: Every wine lover needs this. I keep it in the freezer and take it out to keep my already chilled wine cool!
customer_reviews.author: angelica

customer_reviews.title: Attractive
customer_reviews.text: The Wine Bottle Cooler was nicely presented in an easy to wrap gift box. Versatile in its use too.
customer_reviews.author: vml

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay cold long
customer_reviews.text: I love the look but does not keep cold long. Even after being in the freezer for hours.
customer_reviews.author: bc

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like this wine chiller , however , it does not keep cold for as long as I would like
customer_reviews.author: RosieP33

customer_reviews.title: Nice touch to wine night
customer_reviews.text: Nice chiller. May be a bit darker than pictured, but is still a nice touch and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly chilled wine
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Keeps the wine nice an chilled.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Lachapelle

customer_reviews.title: Keep Wine bottle COOOLLLD
customer_reviews.text: Saw this in a restaurant and ordered it, loved serving wine in it.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Wine Chiller.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps white wine chilled to perfection. Attractive container suitable for formal dining table or casual outdoor use. Gave one chiller as a gift and recipient was pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia D.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and practical Wine Chiller
customer_reviews.text: Excellent high quality product and great seller, too. The marble is beautiful! Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my mom, she loves it and uses it constantly. Works very well and keeps the wine at a great temperature! Definitely recommend this product to others!!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Miller

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Pretty and works well chilling wine. Would work well as a vase or kitchen utensil holder.
customer_reviews.author: PJM

customer_reviews.title: Lovely wine chiller!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely wine chiller! Gets the job done while adding a very elegant touch while entertaining!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cold??
customer_reviews.text: The holder doesn't really seem to keep the wine chilled, which is a bummer
customer_reviews.author: Chere Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Color
customer_reviews.text: wine cooler main photo on the product page is wrong, the color shown is much lighter than what I received.
customer_reviews.author: KALPESH MANIAR

customer_reviews.title: Kept a bottle of champagne cold for over an hour
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for keeping wine cool. It’s heavy and looks good as a center piece.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: The two I received were basically solid black, and ...
customer_reviews.text: The two I received were basically solid black, and I specifically ordered these because they were supposed to be the gray color shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Pridgometer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: It just doesn't keep bottles cold. Great for a vase maybe.
customer_reviews.author: David Wernlund

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wine chiller
customer_reviews.text: Needed a pretty and simple wine chiller. This one was perfect looks beautiful and keeps the wine perfectly chilled
customer_reviews.author: Robert Loganchuk

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, works great. Fun gift for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Mziv

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: Yes I did like it great for entertainment used for wine and sparkling wine
customer_reviews.author: Jolanta Lemanowski

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I received my item on the 17th of January in perfect condition. It is quite a beautiful wine cooler. The marble is very smooth and carries an impressive weight. I am more than happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: We love this product. It is exactly as described and I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Coxe

customer_reviews.title: House warming gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Wine Cooler as a house warming gift. I thought it was a nice item to give my friends.
customer_reviews.author: MARCIA RAMSAY

customer_reviews.title: The right size.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this wine cooler. Color and size just as described. Large enough for any regular size wine bottle, but not champagne.
customer_reviews.author: David Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This looks absolutely stunning. It is very solidly made and wows company.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney J

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The color was not as pictured. Almost entirely grey w/o any veining.
customer_reviews.author: Minetta

customer_reviews.title: Wine holder is great. Color is very neutral and goes with most ...
customer_reviews.text: Wine holder is great. Color is very neutral and goes with most any kitchen design/color. Fits everything I have tried so far! highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler G.

customer_reviews.title: Super smooth and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised with how fast my it took to receive my Wine Chiller. I was a little worried that my purchase would not arrive in time for my event. I absolutely live the details in the marble, and the quality of the chiller is solid. Super smooth and great quality. I thought I wows going to only use this for the event but now I am using it as a plant holder. I am super happy withy purchase, I look forward to purchasing another wine chiller.
customer_reviews.author: Tre

customer_reviews.title: Product will keep an already cold wine cold, do ...
customer_reviews.text: Product will keep an already cold wine cold, do not expect the chiller to chill wine to a preferred temperature.
customer_reviews.author: nathan croop

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This marble wine cooler is much darker than the picture in the product listing, and it's absolutely gorgeous. (See the pictures below.) It's made of thick gray striated marble and has a rubber pad on the bottom. Not what I pictured, but even better. The one I got was made in Taiwan, and it will obviously last forever. Could not be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: 📚 Bookwyrm 📚Top Contributor: Brewing

customer_reviews.title: Fits most bottles and works well!
customer_reviews.text: This wine chiller works very well. We just keep it in the freezer. And so far, it fits all of the wine bottles we have purchased. It’s solid and heavy, and looks like the gray marble as pictured. I would definitely buy again and recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn S.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller diameter than I thought
customer_reviews.text: The cooler sleeve is very pretty, but slightly smaller than I'd hoped (the inside diameter is just under 4"). So it doesn't fit all of the 1.5 liter wine bottles that I use. It is a nice product though, so I'm going to "re-gift" it for someone to use on smaller bottles or as a flower vase.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brasch

customer_reviews.title: Champagne bottles do not fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for a party where we are serving champagne and the bottles do not fit. It's nice looking and I'll keep it for wine, but a bit disappointed that it claims to be for champagne but a standard size champagne bottle doesn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Lolly Gal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Looks and works great! Keeps wine chilled nicely and because it's so beautiful, no need to hide it away when you're not using it. The picture doesn't do it justice. It really looks so much better than what you see here.
customer_reviews.author: bp

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful containers
customer_reviews.text: These wine chillers are fantastic. I bought several to use for utensils in our kitchen. The only thing to be aware of is there is no consistency of color- some are dark and some are light. But all are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: stacey warren

customer_reviews.title: I wine chiller is very nice looking, the problem is the marble is not ...
customer_reviews.text: I wine chiller is very nice looking, the problem is the marble is not very thick so the chill does not last very long. I would buy something thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Free to Live

customer_reviews.title: Keeps wine very cold
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. I keep it in the freezer and use it when needed. It gets super cold and even will fit larger bottles of wine as well as smaller ones. It is also very elegant looking
customer_reviews.author: Heather M.

customer_reviews.title: Darker than photo
customer_reviews.text: I love this product , great gift. It is heavy and is darker than the original photo. Fits all the wine and champagne I have
customer_reviews.author: Pat J.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: We looked at various wine bottle coolers both in stores and on-line and selected Modern Innovations chiller. It has proven to be all we sought, durable, attractive and it works!!!!
customer_reviews.author: IowaViking

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love mine! It's beautiful and honestly has multiple purposes!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Horstman

customer_reviews.title: Very Giftable
customer_reviews.text: This was a great Christmas gift for my mom. It looks very "expensive", and is so easy to use! She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Haley Mueckenhoff

customer_reviews.title: More like a Warmer!
customer_reviews.text: Did not keep my bottle of wine chilled. Within 25 minutes the chiller was basically room temperature. I wasted my money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: J Too

customer_reviews.title: Very classy & funtional
customer_reviews.text: Very classy. Keeps your wine cold, so you can leave it on your table.
customer_reviews.author: TBone

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this!!! Looks gorgeous in my kitchen. I’m using it for spatula and cooking utensil holder but love that it is duel purpose and can be used for a wine chiller too!
customer_reviews.author: HMBHonesty

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great Thick marble with great color, does the job well in keeping the wine cold.
customer_reviews.author: DY

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the wine chiller to serve as a vase for my orchid and it looks amazing!! Great buy, amazing price 😁👏🏽 I'll definitely be getting the matching 'mortar & pestle' set
customer_reviews.author: Suro Tinu

customer_reviews.title: Great item for wine drinkers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for white wine drinkers. Keeps the bottle chilled while on the table. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Indiana Gramma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully crafted, very chic. Great present for my wine loving friend.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Burcham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bottle cooler is very attractive and works great. A great transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color is not like photos
customer_reviews.text: This product is nothing like the photos. The color is black & charcoal grey. If you want something darker, this is for you. But it is nothing like the photo
customer_reviews.author: ElizPowell

customer_reviews.title: It keeps cats from tipping over your drink
customer_reviews.text: That is all I wanted from it, it is probably not a very good wine cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a crack all the way through top to bottom.
customer_reviews.author: oneeyedyeti

customer_reviews.title: Wine Bottle does not fit
customer_reviews.text: Too thin to fit my regular sized wine bottle in it.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie95204

customer_reviews.title: This just looks great on the table
customer_reviews.text: This just looks great on the table, and does a good job of keeping wine cool.
customer_reviews.author: Toby the Terrier

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and functional. Bought for keeping wine cool and it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Booklover

product_meta.title: Modern Innovations Wine Chiller Elegant Grey Marble Wine Bottle Cooler Keeps Wine and Champagne Cold with Multipurpose Use as Kitchen Utensil Holder and Flower Vase (Grey)
feature_bullets: MARBLE WINE COOLER: Made of 100% shimmery grey solid marble with natural temperate retention and stay-cool properties - Shades of Grey May Vary.

SMOOTH & SLEEK: This tabletop cooler has a smooth inner and outer surface providing premium quality, durability, and elegance. This versatile bottle holder can be used to hold a beautiful bouquet of flowers, organize kitchen utensils, store office supplies, and more.

NATURALLY MADE: Your wine chiller is unlike any other. Made from crystalline limestone mined in the eastern part of the Central Mountain Range in Taiwan, this naturally-cut marble wine chiller has a unique color and design- making it truly one of a kind!
KEEPS FURNITURE PROTECTED: Material base helps avoid damage to tables, kitchen counters, and other surfaces. Product Dimensions: 4.5” x 4.5” x 7” tall.
GREAT GIFT: This item makes for a perfect holiday gift whether it used as a wine chiller, flower vase or table centerpiece. ORDER YOUR ELEGANT WINE CHILLER TODAY!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars281 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
